content: if texture is what you re looking for the louis is the pattern you ve been waiting for combining stripes of stockinette with super textured stripes gives louis the ultimate squish factor louis is a 20 row repeat but within this repeat there s lots of repetition and minimal counting of stitches requires this makes it perfect for an adventurous beginner to tackle - it looks far more complicated than it is gauge is not important as long as it remains consistent
